message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. For this exceptional offering, I am proposing a price of $120. I believe this reflects not only the value of the product but also the commitment we have towards providing top-notch solutions to our valued customers.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I am looking to keep the cost below $100. Would it be possible for us to negotiate a price closer to $90?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budgetary concerns and am willing to work within your parameters. In light of this, I would like to propose a price of $95 for our premium product. This still reflects the high quality and value of the item while accommodating your financial situation.
